item.title: Syllabus
item.description: Course Prefix, Number, and Title: DAD 422 Audio Production III Advanced Techniques and MIDI Music AKA Introduction to Game Audio Credits: 3 University Name: Dakota State University Academic Term/Year: Fall 2021 Last date to Drop and receive 100% refund: September 2^nd^, 2021 Last date to Withdraw and earn a grade of 'W': November 5^th^, 2021 Course Meeting Time and Location: MWF 1:00 pm – 2:40 pm TCB 209 Instructor Information: Name: Tate Carson
